title: Nose-Warmer Punch
directions: In a large saucepan bring wine and brandy to a simmer with sugar, cinnamon and cloves, stirring, and cook at a bare simmer 2 minutes. Stir in lemon slices and ladle into heat-proof cups.
ingredients: 3 small lemons, zest scored lengthwise if desired with a channel knife and fruit sliced thin crosswise
